Document: #Command - A briefing must be conducted at the start of every operation before deployment. - The briefing must inform the squads of their orders, with the minimum personnel being the squad leaders. - Scouts Specialists and Intel officers are able to deploy before the operation begins if they have a personal briefing. - Command must attempt to direct marines to build defenses at the landing zone. (FOB) - When assigning a new warship commander, follow the chain of command whenever possible. - [textlink="Chain of Command" link="CMCommandChain"]
